_sText:
De_Sandstorm - Bomb-Defuse

Counter-Terrorists: Prevent Terrorists
from bombing target areas.

Team members must defuse any bombs 
that threaten targeted areas.

Terrorists: The Terrorist carrying the
C4 must destroy one of the target areas. 

Other Notes: There are 2 bomb sites.

==========================================
de_Sandstorm:  
a Counter-Strike: Source experience by DocRock

Map Name: de_Sandstorm.bsp
Filesize:  9.7 mb un-zipped
Author:   DocRock
email:     docrock10@cox.net
Homepage:
http://docrocksmaps.homestead.com

==========================================
LEVEL DESCRIPTION: 

A sandstorm is slowing enveloping a small battle-worn town.  The townspeople are very proud of the town's Egyptian heritage.  There is great history here.  

The people work very hard to keep the town's structure solid, even though they realize their demise is soon - whether it be from the impending doom of the slowly moving sanddune, or the unending war which damages the city streets.  
                                          

Terrorists are an evil kind, and willingly destroy sections of the town, even bomb limestone blocks that the city dwellers 
use to try to rebuild their homes and walls.

==========================================

Special Map Note:  qUiCkSiLvEr spent many hours preparing the NAV file for this map, and re-textured the clouds so they would look like sand blowing across the sky. He also spent a great deal of time working the sounds through the map.  His work is, as always, superb, and I want to thank him for all he did for the success of this map.

==========================================
CONSTRUCTION:

base map:     		None          		 
editor used:            Worldcraft 4.0 Hammer
utilities used:        	none
known bugs:            	none
compile machine:    	AMD Athlon 64x2 Dual  5600+ Core Processor
			3.12 Ghz  2.00 GB of Ram

=======================================================
INSTALLATION:

Run Winzip and unzip de_Sandstorm.zip 
Place the de_Sandstorm.bsp, de_Sandstorm.txt and de_Sandstorm.nav files in:  
C:\Valve\Steam\SteamApps\email\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps

=======================================================
OTHER LEVELS BY DOCROCK:

please refer to my webpage for all of my maps
http://docrocksmaps.homestead.com/docmaps.html
